ack.p: We would like to thank staff at Falklands Conservation and the many other people in the Falkland Islands who have supported botanical fieldwork and made valuable records. Thanks also to Martin Hamilton and the UKOTs team at RBG Kew who have supported this work throughout. Many thanks also to David Broughton, Robin Woods and Richard Lewis for clarification of several key botanical records and to Nick Rendell for useful comments. We also thank anonymous reviewers for useful feedback on the manuscript.
